section.title: The Friend-of-a-friend (FOAF) vocabulary
section.para: The FOAF vocabulary also includes some general-purpose predicates which are widely-understood:

seglistitem.seg: Specifies the primary topic of a document
Specifies that a subject is the key topic of a web page or other resource
Specifies a topic of a page (may be used instead of dct:subject)
Specifies the canonical homepage for something
Specifies the URL of a still image which depicts the subject
